abstract: Saskatchewan Wheat Pool added a cash component to its C$700 million ($591 million) hostile offer for Agricore United late Thursday in a move to persuade Agricore shareholders to back a proposed merger of Canada’s two biggest grain handlers. Under the new bid, Agricore shareholders may receive C$11.33 in cash or 1.3601 SaskPool shares or any combination of the two.
lead_paragraph: Saskatchewan Wheat Pool added a cash component to its C$700 million ($591 million) hostile offer for Agricore United late Thursday in a move to persuade Agricore shareholders to back a proposed merger of Canada’s two biggest grain handlers. Under the new bid, Agricore shareholders may receive C$11.33 in cash or 1.3601 SaskPool shares or any combination of the two.

headline.main: Canadian Grain Company Ups Offer for Rival
